Project Summary

Project Information

FieldValue
NameFollow
DescriptionFollow is a Java application which allows a user to monitor ("follow") several log files concurrently. The name and behavior of this application are inspired by the "f" (follow) flag of the UNIX command "tail".
Homepagehttp://hallwaytech.github.com/follow

Project Organization

This project does not belong to an organization.
